message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of our premium product with you. I think it's a great fit for your needs, and I'm happy to make you a competitive offer.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I see the value in your product, $1200000 is slightly above my budget. I'm willing to pay $1050000 for it. Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for 1150000. This is a fair price considering the value the product will bring to your business.
